segments.text: To get around your difficulty , Mr . Brown , I'd suggest that you reduce your order by half . You can send in an Addi trional order later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll consider the possibility . By the way , when do I open the L / C if I want the goods to be delivered in June ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A month before the time you want the goods to be delivered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you possibly effect shipment more promptly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Getting the goods ready , making out the documents and booking the shipping space - - all this takes time , you know . You cannot expect us to make delivery in less than a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well , Mrs.Wang . I'll not reduce my order . I'll take the full quantity you offer . And I'll arrange for the Letter of Credit to be opened in your favor as soon as I get home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Early next week . In the meantime , I should be very pleased if you would get everything ready . I hope that the goods can dispatched promptly after you get my Letter of Credit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can rest assured of that . We'll book you order and inquire for the shipping space now , so that shipment can be effected within two or three weeks of receipt of your L / C .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That'll be fine . I appreciate your cooperation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Well , thanks to your cooperation , our discussion has been very pleasant and fruitful . I sincerely hope that the volume of trade between us will be even greater in the future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , Mrs . Wang , we have a mind to do joint participation with you on Japanese arts and crafts in our market . Would you entertain this proposal ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , this is something new . A few of our friends from Europe have also suggested that we participate in joint enterprise with them dealing in some of our goods . We think there are a lot of details to go into .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you feel our proposal is attractive , it is estimated that business to the extent of over twenty million marks can be done in this manner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Naturally , I appreciate your efforts in pushing the sale of Japanese arts and crafts . But I'm not in a position to discuss your proposal today . I must first talk to our director , and discuss it with you some other time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Anyway , I'll be staying here for another two weeks . But I'm looking forward to having something done in this respect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll talk about it next time . Now that everything is settled , let's have a cup of tea , and take our minds off business for a change .
segments.speaker: S1
